title: Top Five Investing and Finance Books You Need to Read Right Now
subtitle: Discover the must-read investing and finance books that can transform your financial knowledge and decision-making for a prosperous future.
content:
Top Five Investing and Finance Books You Need to Read Right Now

Hi, I’m Tyler. I’m a former financial advisor and portfolio manager, and now I make financial content for free so that you don’t have to pay for it.

1. The Only Investment Guide You'll Ever Need by Andrew Tobias

This is literally, and I’m using the word literally, literally the only investment guide you’ll ever need.

2. The Psychology of Money by Morgan Housel

This is a page turner, and it will tell you exactly why you make boneheaded moves every single day of your life, even though you know they’re terrible financial ideas.

3. All About Asset Allocation by Richard Fairey

This one will give you about 50 model portfolios for all different types of time horizons, asset class selection, and risk tolerances.

4. Die With Zero by Bill Perkins

This one I needed to read because my mistake is never spending any of my money. This book is a brilliant thought exercise from start to finish.

5. The 4-Hour Workweek by Tim Ferriss

No single book has influenced the course of my life or thought process more than this one. If you’re fed up and ready for a change, this might be the book that you didn’t know you needed to read right now.

And if any of this is helpful, like and follow, and I’ll keep trying to get you one step closer to where you need to be.
